original: intros a l. induction l as [| (b, n) l' IHl'] using unique_key_ind. - simpl. apply permutation_one_inv. - simpl. destruct (eqA_dec a b) as [Heq | Hneq]. + simpl. rewrite Heq. apply permutation_swap. + simpl. rewrite (permutation_cons_ex_aux b l' (add_frequency_list a l')). destruct H as [l1 [l2 [Heq Hperm]]]. rewrite Heq. apply permutation_transposition.
